name: Trelew Farm

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at Trelew Farm over the May Bank Holiday weekend. We received a very warm welcome from Nicola, along with some great recommendations of things to see and do.
reviews.title: 10/10 - we're definitely coming back!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The farmhouse is a beautiful 17th century building with plenty of character although the bedroom was recently decorated and very stylish. The en-suite bathroom was modern and well-appointed and the bed was the most comfortable I've experienced in a long time! High-speed Wifi is provided free of charge.
reviews.title: Great B&B in SW Cornwall, very friendly, great food and brilliant location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at Trelew farm for two nights over the Easter weekend as we wanted somewhere quiet, rural and close to the Minack. Every box ticked and more!!!
reviews.title: Just marvellous!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The B&B is of high quality and is on a working farm. Nicola was a great host and allowed us our space to explore and relax. When ever we needed any information she was very helpful and friendly and has a great deal of information to allow for the exporation of the surrounding area, which has a good deal of ancient sites to visit.
reviews.title: A very special place

reviews.text: The breakfast was delicious and is cooked to order - what more could we ask for from a B&B.
reviews.title: Second visit looking toward the third

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Thanks for the weekend and hope to visit again.
reviews.title: It was nice but probably won't return

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: How many places have their own stone circle ? and we were able to stay on a farm that has one one their land -so serene so special .A proper working farm heading towards Lands End we felt privileged to stay there. A good breakfast set us up for the day. Nicola was very helpful and did a marvellous job in looking after us. A clean ship is a happy ship and this is certainly a first class port of call.
reviews.title: Very enjoyable stay

description: 4 Star Silver Awarded B & B is offered down a country lane at Trelew Farm . We have two ensuite rooms a king size bedded ensuite or a double and single bedded ensuite both with TV/DVD players, tea/coffee and free WIFI access.Come and enjoy a relaxed stay on this working dairy farm ideal for touring the tip of England, 10 minutes drive from the Minack Theatre, Lands End, Sennen Cove and St Michael's Mount, 20 minutes drive from St Ives and surrounded by the coastal footpath.Nature trail to ancient stone circle on the farm and plenty of off road parking, Come and enjoy a relaxed stay.
